src/systems/ComboSystem.ts.description: ComboSystem now has milestone detection: checkMilestone() private method checks if combo matches COMBO_MILESTONES array and hasn't been reached yet. Emits 'combo-milestone' event with {milestone, multiplier}. Uses reachedMilestones Set to prevent re-triggering. Has resetMilestones(), fullReset(), hasMilestoneBeenReached(), getReachedMilestones() methods.

src/ui/HUD.ts.description: HUD now has update(delta, comboSystem) method that updates combo timer bar each frame. Gets remaining time from ComboSystem.getRemainingTime() and passes to updateComboTimerBar(). Called from GameplayScene.update() after comboSystem.update().

src/systems/SlashSystem.ts.description: Added multi-kill visual feedback system: createMultiKillEffect() method shows floating text (DOUBLE/TRIPLE/MEGA/ULTRA KILL), bonus score text, particle effects at kill positions, and screen flash for 4+ kills. Uses killPositionsThisCycle array to track positions. Connected to ParticleSystem via setParticleSystem().

src/config/constants.ts.description: Added MULTI_KILL_BONUS constants and getMultiKillBonus() helper function for calculating bonus multipliers (2 kills = 1.5x, 3 kills = 2.0x, 4+ kills = 2.5x)

src/systems/ParticleSystem.ts.description: ParticleSystem has multiple particle types (SPARKLE, FIRE, LIGHTNING, etc.) with object pooling. Has emit() for one-shot effects, createWeaponTrail(), createHitEffect(). Suitable for combo milestone effects but needs new configurations added.

src/managers/ComboEffectsManager.ts.description: New ComboEffectsManager handles combo milestone visual effects. Has MILESTONE_CONFIGS for 5x/10x/15x/20x/25x with escalating effects. Uses ParticleSystem.emit() for particles, Graphics for screen flash. Listens to 'combo-milestone' EventBus events. Methods: setParticleSystem(), triggerMilestoneEffect(), triggerCelebration(), cleanup(), destroy().
